PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 

Boutiqaat Service (E-Commerce Domain) – Gurugram  April 2018 to Present 
Role:  Data Scientist / Data Engineer 

Responsibilities: 
• Competitor Intelligence Project - Crawling data from different web sites , clean it , analyse it 

and apply machine learning algorithm to compare products based on brand and category 
information. Product is matched based on description, image & price.  

• Python based auto generated ‘Anomaly Detection Reports’ of orders, customers behaviour, 
purchase behaviour and tables synced are published  by email every day.   

• Reports development on ‘Apache Superset’ & ‘Power BI’ for purchase, sales, operation 
department. 

• Migration & Syncing Data from one DB to another DB on different EC2 instances using Embulk 
ETL tool. 

• Development of Greenplum Infra - Developing, Partitioning, Migrations etc.   
• Python Django based web application for purchasing team to store events done by celebrities.  

Languages Python, R, Java, C/C++

Technologies Machine Learning, Deep Learning, MS BI, Apache Superset, 
GreenPlum, AWS 

Data Mining Tools Rapid Miner, Weka

NoSQL Database Cassandra, Mongo DB

RDBMS MYSQL,PSQL, MS SQL, Oracle,SQLite3

Platform Linux



Technologies Used – Python, Keras, tensorflow, scikit-learn, gensim, nltk, h5py, pandas, pickle, 
Django, ORM,Embedding, AWS, EC2 Instances, HTML, CSS, AJAX, SQL, PSQL, Green Plum,  
Embulk, Scrapy, Selenium Web Driver, Linux 

STMicroelectronics Greater Noida   May 2017 to April 2018 
Role:  Data Science Trainee 

Responsibilities: 
• Responsible for designing, and developing Django based web application tools for auto 

validation of detectors using Python, Django, Machine Learning (Support Vector Machine, 
Pattern Recognition) that is very sophisticated and user friendly for checking the quality of 
packages in semiconductor domain.  

• Fetching failed detectors of different technologies and layers from Brion Database (MYSQL) 
with millions of defects and using pattern recognition, classify the detectors either pass or fail. 

• Query data from oracle database that have past 10 years data for showing defect trends. 
• The layer owner can directly review the packages either on web or pdf that is automatically 

emailed to them. 
• Deployed another Acceptance Threshold tools (Apache based web application framework) that 

is helpful for updating detector’s acceptance threshold along with direction and dose, focus 
bias. 

• Designing new ideas to enhance the use of tools and minimise processing time taken by it. 

Environment: Python, Numpy, Pandas, Scipy, Seaborn, Matplot, Oracle, MYSQL, SQLite3, 
Machine Learning, SVM, Django, HTML, CSS, Java-Script, Linux 

Cynet Systems                           April 2015 to July 2016 
Role:  Data Analyst/ Talent Acquisition 

Responsibilities: 
• Report Development of the performance of recruiters using ‘MS BI’ tool. 
• Employee work measure chart, outputs potential of work done in a day from the time he logged 

in first into the portal and last logged out . 
• Employee Performance Appraisal Management System: Employee Performance Appraisal 

Management Systems Includes various metrics like, Work Quality Quantity of work 
Cooperation, Attitude, Initiative, Dependability, Planning flexibility, leader ship quality. A rating 
scale Software which appraises each individual. Application consists of three modules, 
Employee [Associate] role who have enough privileges to rate himself on various metrics used 
in appraisal evaluation can even view his appropriate rating for every month and so, Supervisor 
Role is a mid-role wherein he can approve/view his underlying associates appraisal rating. 
Manager Role is the one who have the capability of update / Edit appraisal rating of all the 
employees underlying him organisation.developing Custom SSRS Reports [RDL and RDLC’S], 
rolled out Monthly appraisal reports to recipients using Data driven subscription.  

Environment: MS BI, My SQL 

Innova AM Tech Pvt. Ltd.                      April 2014 to March 2015  
Role:  Technical Recruiter 

Responsibilities: 
• Technical recruitment, Hiring, Campus Recruitment, US Staffing

Slang words, sometimes referred to as informal or shortened words, are also not allowed. If the guessing player suggests a letter which occurs in the word, the other player writes it in all its correct positions. If the suggested letter does not occur in the word, the other player draws one element of a hanged man stick figure as a tally mark.

 SUMMARY

             Project Description: 

   TGI Friday, LA madeleine, Mims Cafe are the TMM Clients that used to take complete Pricing/Financial        recommendations done via Fishbowl. These clients   used to provide data in the form of different zip files, .csv files. We used to load data from these files into the database then process that data into different POS and Fact tables, that analytics team used to do their analysis and, in the end, recommends customer the pricing of their products and other different services.
   Roles and Responsibilities - 


· Understanding the Business requirements and extracting the mechanism to implement 

Business strategy.
· Performing daily ETL tasks and implementing complex SSIS packages such as reading the data from zip files and processing them as per the business requirements.

· Developed different database jobs to import data from different sources.
· Performed indexing, tuning, query optimization for different jobs. 

· Responsible for creating different reports as per the business requirement.
· Created different SSRS (SQL Server Reporting Services) reports to check the data quality and make sure that information is consistent.
· Automated different ETL processes and reports to avoid manual intervention.
· Preparing documents prior to development phase such as estimation sheet, query log, low-level design document (LLD).

       Dedicated team carries out the end to end activities for the Tata Teleservice. Development, Maintenance & support are carried out by the team to process the day-to-day activities of the customer such as voice call, SMS&MMS, Internet connection, Data download and Upload, Video conferencing etc.                          With the latest feeds, these decision agents have various internal modules that turn around a credit        request very efficiently, assessing the risk and accordingly minimizing the risk to the company.
